I assembled forms, civil documents, medical exams, and supporting evidence.

snippets.html:

snippets.name: Request for Evidence Reviewed

I prepared for a USCIS interview.

I reviewed the record, rehearsed likely questions, and confirmed appointment logistics.

snippets.name: USCIS Interview Appearance
snippets.html:
I attended a USCIS interview.

I filed an administrative appeal with the Administrative Appeals Office.

snippets.html:

snippets.name: EAD Receipt Notice (Auto Extension)
snippets.text:
I received the Employment Authorization Document (EAD) receipt notice; an automatic extension applies.
{key:tab}
I reviewed the EAD receipt notice and confirmed that the automatic extension applies.
Next steps:
- Calendar a reminder to file for renewal six months before expiration.
- Create a task to pre-review the renewal packet and gather updated evidence.
- Send the client a packet (by mail and through the client portal) explaining the receipt and automatic extension.
- Scan the notice and upload it to the client portal.
- Request copies of both sides of the current EAD card for the file.
snippets.html:
I received the Employment Authorization Document (EAD) receipt notice; an automatic extension applies.

{key:tab}

I reviewed the EAD receipt notice and confirmed that the automatic extension applies.

Next steps:

- Calendar a reminder to file for renewal six months before expiration.

- Create a task to pre-review the renewal packet and gather updated evidence.

- Send the client a packet (by mail and through the client portal) explaining the receipt and automatic extension.

- Scan the notice and upload it to the client portal.

- Request copies of both sides of the current EAD card for the file.

snippets.name: Asylum Annual Fee Paid (USCIS) OBO client
snippets.text:
I paid $100 Asylum Annual Fee (AFF) on behalf of client using office card. Noted expense on client's billing record. Date of AFF invoice was: 
Updated matter record to reflect that payment made for this year and due date for next fee.
